description: Collaborated with development agency to re-design and build the Zero Motorcycles website. With 15 unique locales, an accessories Shopify e-commerce site, model pages, dealership locator, and a variety of other new pages - we launched the site within 6 months.

Worked with e-commerce business to improve mobile UI, increase visibility, and drive more conversions. The project included a full rebrand, redesign of the home and product pages with a mobile-first focus, integration of analytics tools for better insight into user behavior, and implementation of SEO-focused copywriting. Daily active users up ~300%.

Built web forms and dealer locator for Zero website. Connected Meta, Google, and DealerSpike forms to HubSpot through Zapier. Created script in HubSpot to accurately route global lead submissions to closest dealer by drivng distance. Increased lead submissions routing accuracy by 34%.
